pages.text: In order to make Shell, you'll need a Nacre. Shift click on this icon to see how to make one.

pages.name: Shell
pages.text: In order to have your Nacre construct a Drill, you will need to build this multiblock, then interact with her with a pickaxe in your hand.

pages.title: Creating a Pearl
pages.text: In order to use shell, you will need to place 64 Gravel at the top, 64 Sand on the left, 64 Clay balls on the right, and a chroma of your choice at the bottom. After time passes it'll slowly drain these materials. After it's finished it will create a pearl for you to collect.
